mapper.insert: insert into exam_exam (id, name, subject_id, train_course,industry,work_type exam_type, start_time, end_time, remark, operate_time, operator, operator_ip, pre_exam) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{trainCourse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preExam,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update exam_exam
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
train_course = #{trainCourse,jdbcType=INTEGER},
industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER},
work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exam_type = #{examType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pre_exam = #{preExam,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exam_exam set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, train_course = #{trainCourse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exam_type = #{examType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_exam = #{preExam,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exam_exam set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, train_course = #{trainCourse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_type = #{workType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exam_type = #{examType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.qualified_score,b.total_score,b.exam_time from exam_exam as a INNER JOIN exam_subject as b on a.subject_id=b.id where a.work_type = #{workType}

SELECT a.*,b.name as train_course_name FROM (SELECT a.*,b.name as industry_name FROM (SELECT a.*,b.name as work_type_name FROM (SELECT a.*,b.qualified_score as qualified_score,b.total_score as total_score FROM exam_exam as a LEFT JOIN exam_subject as b on a.subject_id=b.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.name},'%') AND a.industry = #{search.industryCategory} AND a.work_type = #{search.workType} limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}) as a LEFT JOIN sys_work_type as b on a.work_type=b.id)as a LEFT JOIN sys_industry as b on a.industry=b.id)as a LEFT JOIN exam_train_course as b on a.train_course = b.id
